title: Media Literacy Education for Critical Reception of Asian Representations

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Media Analysis, Multicultural Society Understanding, and Basic Language Proficiency
context.additional_context: A language education program for general citizens, featuring a blended online-offline learning environment utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze diverse media discourses of Asian expression.
Learners can construct arguments explaining the social impact of Asian expression within a multicultural context.
Learners can write argumentative structures identifying biased discourses by comparatively analyzing contrasting media cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
